abstract: Fox News Channel is replacing its 5 p.m. news broadcast “The Big Story” with an election-themed program for the foreseeable future, marking the first time in eight years that the cable news channel has tinkered with its popular early evening line-up.
lead_paragraph: Fox News Channel is replacing its 5 p.m. news broadcast “The Big Story” with an election-themed program for the foreseeable future, marking the first time in eight years that the cable news channel has tinkered with its popular early evening line-up.

headline.main: ‘America’s Election HQ’ Replaces ‘Big Story’ on Fox News
